RootDevice.Doc: This device is intended as a demonstration of how to use the abstract modules defined in the HGI Core domain. The vendor has provided a proprietry module with two operations on and off. This is clearly a candidate for the module class BooleanState.

Module.name: proprietaryPower
Module.Doc: The proprietry interface for turning the switch on and off. Actions for setting the state to on or off and for querying the state.

Action.name: state
Action.Doc: Query the state of the switch. Returns the string "on" or "off".

Event.name: switchEvent
Event.Doc: An event that indicates the new state of the switch.
